WorkItem.Description: I've been searching around and couldn't find anything about this so I'm creating a "issue". Is there a way that you can set Rawr to only show one variation of a specific item in the upgrade list? I don't want to see the same item three times all the time :P.
WorkItem.Summary: Number of the same item in the item list

Comments.Message: Go into "Edit Gemming Templates" and down the bottom it has a drop down box for the number to show.   It is the first option I change every time there is a new version released :)
Ah thanks! I thought I saw something about it somewhere, just needed to make sure I wasn't losing my mind :)
